summary:
Anonymous is a global group of online activists and hackers. They started in 2003 on an online message board and are known for their cyberattacks against governments, companies, and organizations like the Church of Scientology. Members, called "anons," often wear Guy Fawkes masks to hide their identities, inspired by the comic book "V for Vendetta."

The group has faced arrests worldwide, but some see them as digital freedom fighters, while others call them cyber terrorists. In 2012, *Time* magazine recognized their influence, and they remain active, recently supporting the George Floyd protests.
title: Anonymous (hacker group)
